title: Omega Teemo sounds like Teemo
body:
I don't know if its just me but whenever I play a game, there's nothing I find more enjoyable than playing {{champion:17}}  in top lane, And to show my like for the champion I have purchased Omega Squad {{champion:17}}. I enjoy my skin and all its effect however there is one thing I'm not enjoying. Whenever I Enter a game as Omega and there's a regular {{champion:17}}  on the other team, Sometimes Teemo's Omega quotes are replaced with classic Teemo's quote.

Now I don't know if this is intentional or a script bug, but I would enjoy it if the little glitch was repaired, its not the end of the world if its not and I honestly would care less if it wasn't. But I know that in order to improve upon games, the community needs to report glitches otherwise it prevents the game from evolving and becoming greater than it already is.

replies.body:
Hey Noctis Aduro - 

Thanks for the report! This is definitely a bug and not something that's intended. We're aware of an audio issue where skins with different VO from the base are playing base VO. ;_; We're in the process of getting a fix in.

You've described a classic case of Teemo Overload

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KDIAGsCOWD8
